quote: Dealing with failure is easy: Work hard to improve. Success is also easy to handle: You've solved the wrong problem. Work hard to improve.
author: Alan Perlis

quote: If you want to have good ideas, you must have many ideas.
author: Linus Pauling

quote: When your work speaks for itself, don't interrupt.
author: Henry J. Kaiser

quote: Life is like playing a violin in public and learning the instrument as one goes on.
author: Samuel Butler
